personalInfo.name: Loïc Muhirwa
personalInfo.title: AI Applied Scientist & Engineer
personalInfo.summary: AI & ML Applied Scientist & Engineer with 8+ years of experience in the field. Proven ability to design, develop, and deploy innovative AI solutions that leverage cutting-edge technologies, with a strong emphasis on scalable system design, fast prototyping, implementation, deployment, and maintenance of large-scale production AI systems. Expertise in generative AI, large language models (LLM), natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision.

highlights: Designed and developed innovative production-ready applications leveraging multimodal models, Retrieval Augmented Generation, long context understanding, reasoning engines, and agentic workflows.
Owned the implementation, deployment, and maintenance of large-scale AI systems in production environment.
Provided technical leadership on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) solutions with focus on Vertex AI and generative AI technologies.
Implemented, fine-tuned, and deployed state-of-the-art LLMs in GCP cloud-based production environment.
Owned end-to-end process of deploying and maintaining LLMs leveraging Kubernetes for container orchestration.
Utilized Huggingface, LangChain, RAG, and PEFT to improve LLM performance in production.

highlights: Led team of Senior Data Scientists and Senior Data Engineers focused on AI research and development.
Directed overhaul of AI research and solutions addressing Government agencies' complex challenges.
Established best practices for containerization with Docker and scalable deployment using Kubernetes.
